name: Eggspectation
address: 10551 St Edwards Dr, Richmond, BC V6X 3L8, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Eggstravaganza
hasMenuItem.description: Our classic dish: two eggs, prepared any style, two slices of brioche french toast with pure canadian maple syrup, a choice of sausage, bacon or smoked ham and our succulent lyonnaise-style potatoes.

review.reviewBody: They give you the option on here for a 'bowl' size for the latte which I selected to see what it meant. Alas I was given a normal sized paper cup and not a bowl of latte. It was very good though. The Nutella banana crepe was very generous with the Nutella. Almost too generous where I'd have needed a bowl sized latte to wash it down.
Several times we receive our order with at least 1 order missing and thenhave  to wait at the restaurant for them to make it or if delivered, order from somewhereelse.  Giving 1 star cause Ihad to.
The eggstravaganza breakfast is the way to go!
Everything is dry with no saves or flavours. Food is super overcooked and the gluten free bun is just bread. Didn't follow an instructions I asked

Underwhelming. I ordered berries but got mixed fruit. Cant remember if there was a price difference but I didnt  want melon. Im also not impressed with  whatever is going on with the bacon i paid extra for. Ive added bacon many times here and it  is usually nice and thick. This is thin and overcooked but the same price as the nice Bacon even though it's clearly less bacon as a result. It  feels like a bait and switch. Not great.
